text: I can't wait for the next 'Whimsical Worlds' meetup! I've been working on my fanfic for weeks now.
Jane, thanks for recommending the 'Literary Enthusiasts' club! I went to their last session and it was enlightening. I'm definitely going to be a regular.
I'm so excited for the 'Whimsical Worlds' convention next month. I've got my cosplay ready and my fanfic draft to share!
Jane, thank you for introducing me to 'Whimsical Worlds'. I've found such a welcoming community there.
